=== Ripening Time with Modifiers === {| class="wikitable" | style="text-align: center;" ! Modifier !! Ripe-Wither Time !! Boost Mulch Needed to Ripen |- ! None | 2 days -
4 days || --- |- ! Mulch or Sprayduck | 1 day 8 hours -
2 days 16 hours || 384 mulch |- ! Mulch & Sprayduck | 21 hours 20 mins -
42 hours 40 mins || 256 mulch |}
revision.comment: Importing a new version from external source
